labInfoDescription: Detailed overview of the lab's core properties and specifications.

setupSteps.title: Setup Steps
setupSteps.description: Define the sequence of commands or actions required to set up the lab environment.
setupSteps.createStepDescription: Add a new step to configure the lab environment. Define commands and execution parameters.
setupSteps.editStepDescription: Modify the setup step configuration and execution parameters.
setupSteps.noSetupStepsDescription: Start by adding the first step to guide users on how to prepare their lab environment.
setupSteps.tip: The step order is automatically managed by moving steps up or down. The commands are executed sequentially.
setupSteps.deleteConfirmation: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently remove the setup step from the lab.

form.title: Title
form.titlePlaceholder: e.g., Install Docker, Configure Network, Setup Database
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Provide additional context or instructions for this step...
form.setupCommandDescription: Shell command or script to execute for this setup step
form.expectedExitCodeDescription: The expected exit code for successful execution (usually 0)
form.retryCountDescription: Number of times to retry on failure (1-10)
form.continueOnFailureDescription: Continue to next step even if this step fails
